statements: UPDATE healthcare_schedule SET specialty = 'Dentist' WHERE provider_id = 1
UPDATE healthcare_schedule SET provider_name = 'Dr. Smith', weekly_schedule = '{"monday": "9AM-5PM", "tuesday": "OFF"}' WHERE provider_id = 2

UPDATE healthcare_schedule SET provider_name = 'Dr. Smith', specialty = 'Cardiology', weekly_schedule = '{"Monday": "8AM-5PM", "Tuesday": "8AM-5PM", "Wednesday": "OFF", "Thursday": "8AM-5PM", "Friday": "8AM-1PM"}' WHERE provider_id = 1;

UPDATE healthcare_schedule SET specialty = 'Dermatology', weekly_schedule = '{"Monday": "9AM-6PM", "Tuesday": "9AM-6PM", "Wednesday": "9AM-6PM", "Thursday": "OFF", "Friday": "9AM-3PM"}', provider_name = 'Dr. Johnson' WHERE provider_id = 2;
